::Prowl::

Prowl spins in the air and pulls up, several shots hitting him and
denting and cracking his armor. He feels a few rapid-fire shots hit
him, but his focus right now was Fireblade, although he wasn't going
to swoop down again.

Taking out his old acid pellet gun, he fires four pellets down at the
Decepticon. He hoped that Fireblade would try to deflect them with his
sword, as they would release the acid on contact, and would eat
through alot of metal if neccessary.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireBlade::
> 
> FireBlade smiles as the missiles fall to the ground....And an even
> larger grin comes over him as Prowl flies towards him. He deflects
> three of the laser blasts with his Blade but on knicks his other
arm.
> He growls and fires 10 more PowerSurge shots from his rifle at the
> incoming Prowl still continuing to run for the base.
> 
> He was now within 100 m of it.
